summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of HFashion e-commerce demo completed. All requested features working correctly - homepage displays real fashion images, products render properly in featured/trending sections (issue from iteration_1 RESOLVED), search overlay has frosted glass effect, add-to-cart works, checkout 3-step flow complete, mobile responsive, window.hfashion tracking populated.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with real fashion images from Unsplash
Hero section displays 3 fashion images in tetris grid layout
Featured products section shows 4 product cards with images, prices, and discount badges
Trending products section shows 4 product cards
Categories section (Women's, Men's, Accessories) with images
Search overlay opens with frosted glass backdrop-blur effect (blur(16px))
Search autocomplete returns results (tested 'dress' - 3 results)
Popular search terms clickable
Quick Add button adds product to cart
Cart sidebar opens with item details
Cart page displays items with quantity controls
Checkout 3-step flow (Shipping -> Payment -> Review)
Pre-filled demo shipping data (Demo User, 123 Fashion Street, New York)
Payment options (Credit Card / PayPal)
Place Order creates order and clears cart
Product listing page with filters (price range) and sort (newest, price)
Product detail page with size/color selectors, quantity, add to cart
Mobile responsive (375x812 iPhone viewport)
Mobile hamburger menu navigation
Mobile filter sheet on product listing
Account page shows demo user info
window.hfashion tracking object properly populated
Tracking: sessionId, userId, currentPage, pageViews, cartValue, etc.
Event tracking: page_view, product_view, cart_add, cart_fetch
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED in /app/frontend/src/data/store.js - no backend APIs (as intended)
Cart persistence uses localStorage which doesn't persist across browser sessions in testing
Medallia scripts config ready but disabled (scriptsConfig.enabled: false) - ready for integration
seed_data_creation: Mock data already seeded in store.js with 18 products across categories
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working. Frontend-only architecture uses localStorage for cart/orders. Issue from iteration_1 (products not displaying) has been RESOLVED - products now render correctly in featured/trending sections.
mocked_api_notice: ALL APIs ARE MOCKED - Products, Cart, Orders, User data stored in localStorage via /app/frontend/src/data/store.js
